name: Eaqueo
content:
Eaqueo

The Finishing Knot

Source Inner Sea Gods pg. 326
Pathfinder Wiki Eaqueo

Details

Alignment LE
Pantheon Infernal Dukes
Areas of Concern Depression, nooses, sad stories
Domains Evil, Law, Liberation, Madness
Subdomains Devil (Evil), Devil (Law), Freedom, Insanity, Nightmare
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Net
Symbol Black silk rope noose
Sacred Animal(s) Snake
Sacred Color(s) Black, blue

Obedience

Tie a noose and leave it around the neck of any dead creature. Gain a +4 profane bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects.

Boons - Infernal Dukes

Source Book of the Damned pg. 116
The Lords of Hell, the Dukes of Perdition, and the Princes of Damnation are all names for the infamous nobility of the Pit- the elite caste of devilkind known as the infernal dukes.

All infernal dukes are lawful evil and range in power from CR 26 to CR 27. The boons they grant are less complex than those granted by archdevils, manifesting as spell-like abilities usable once per day each.

1: blood biography
2: stone tell
3: mass suffocation

For Followers of Eaqueo

Feats

Hellish Shackles
